header.label: OUR PRODUCTS
header.title: CNC & Aviation Part Portfolio
header.intro: EMOF Teknoloji offers a wide product range including aircraft structures, engine components, and custom project parts.

items.name: Airframe Components
items.desc: High-precision CNC machining for fuselage and structural components.

items.name: CNC Machined Prototypes
items.desc: Low-volume, rapid prototype production for R&D projects.

items.name: Engine Components
items.desc: Engine parts resistant to thermal and mechanical loads.

items.name: Custom Project Parts
items.desc: Custom part production according to customer drawings.

items.name: Landing Gear Components
items.desc: High-strength machined parts used in aircraft landing gears.

items.name: Composite Mold Elements
items.desc: Mold parts with precision surfaces for composite production processes.

items.name: Fuel System Parts
items.desc: Precision machined fittings ensuring fuel flow and safety.

items.name: Hydraulic System Components
items.desc: Parts focused on sealing and durability for hydraulic control units.

items.name: Electronic Box & Enclosure Parts
items.desc: Protective aluminum enclosure parts for aviation electronics (avionics).

items.name: Helicopter Airframe Connection Elements
items.desc: Connection and load-bearing elements used in helicopter structures.
